name: vscode-markdown-everywhere
description: Embed and highlight and preview markdown everywhere. e.g. Highlight python markdown cell/ Highlight julia markdown doc string

markdown-everywhere.enhancing-typing.description: Inject onEnterRules to markdown (reload needed). After opening, extra characters will be added when editing markdown and pressing enter.

markdown-everywhere.preview-mode.description: How to deal with the original source code (change file-content to trigger). 'splitter' for ignoring them and put lines as splitter. 'ignore' for ignoring. 'fenced' for showing source code as fenced code. 'folded' for showing source code as folded fenced code

markdown-everywhere.customized-rules.description: Save the first element "defaultRules" to keep default rules. Remove to only use customized rules. See README.md#Customize for details
